name: Panzera
description:
A Platformer where you have to use your stretchy powers to defeat the evil nightmare monsters and travel each level . 

Controls :

(A) Button - Stretchy Power

(B) Button - Jump

(UP) - Jump

(Down) - Reset Target Reticle

(Targeting)-  Use Your Finger To Drag The Target Reticle Around, Aiming At Enemies

Place It On Walls Before Stretching To Swing
